attributes.review: My grandpa is a trump supporter and loves trump with all his heart. So once my grandpa got his first cellphone i helped my grandpa get this app. A week after downloading the app he hated it! Not only did the app take days to download (mind you any other app we tried to download took a few seconds to download) but it was very glitchy. My grandpa was very disappointed with how unprofessional this app is. And iâ€™m so upset that this gave my grandpa with high blood pressure so much stress. I really donâ€™t like this app and i just thought i should express how i felt.
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: this is the worst app i have ever downloaded. it will factory reset your phone and then fill your camera roll with pictures of donald trump. after scrolling through these photos, i immediately started projectile vomiting and having explosive diarrhea for 3 days straight because i was so disgusted. i went to the hospital and i was told i have one of the worst cases of trumpicitis in history. after spending some time on the tik tok app, the best app ever created, i finally recovered. do NOT download this app. it should be banned from the app store.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
